about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey with the Treasure Trove Pack for Dungeon Defenders II! This pack is a collector’s dream, brimming with cosmetic treasures that will dazzle your allies and intimidate your foes. Unearth a wealth of Shards that promise to fortify your defenses and amplify your offense, as well as a chest full of gems to unlock even more cosmetic enhancements!

This pack may only be purchased once per account. To redeem the items contained in the pack, visit and interact with the Mailbox in the Heroes Marketplace or Private Tavern.

This pack contains:

2,850 Gems to purchase Heroes, Flair, Costumes, and more. (2,500 + 350 Extra Gems!)

2 Mythical Defender Packs to gain any number of cosmetic rewards to look your best!

One Shard Pack from Campaign and every level of Chaos (11 total!) to equip unique bonuses to your heroes and defenses.

Legendary Terror Dragolich Pet to strike fear into the hearts of your enemies.
